data.message: Hello Coca Colonists, in Germany there's little litter. Why? Most bottles, glass and plastic, can be returned and the buyer gets refunded. Do we need to lobby governments or Coca Cola to ensure that this becomes worldwide practice?

replies.message: Hi Celia, we know sustainability, and recycling specifically, is a vital issue to address and that’s why we’re currently in the process of reviewing our sustainable packaging strategy which we will publish in the summer. Deposit return schemes have been a big part of these discussions as more people are looking for ways to increase recycling rates. So while our review is still ongoing, it’s clear to us that the time is right to trial a well-designed deposit scheme for drinks containers, starting in Scotland where conversations are underway already. To keep up to date with all of our future sustainability announcements please visit www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
